title: LBJ Memorial Grove on the Potomac: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Become a Junior Ranger Junior Rangers explore, learn about, and protect national parks. You can earn your own Junior Ranger badge by completing the Lets Move Outside Junior Ranger book. Mail completed books to: GWMP Junior Rangers 700 George Washington Memorial Parkway McLean, VA 22101      Become a Webranger Are you and your family planning a trip to a National Park? Do you want to explore more of your National Parks online? Become a WebRanger.      Let's Move Outside Kids need at least one hour of exercise every day to stay physically and mentally fit. What better way to do that than by playing outside in your national park?
